channel.title: Agender
channel.description: This are the rss feeds for project Agender, if you like Agender you should agregate this feeds.

item.title: visual c++
item.description: The next release of Agender will be build using visual c++ 6.0, this will result in a smaller executable, it also is beeing build with the windows version of NSIS this makes a smaller installer.

item.title: Agender wiki
item.description: Now Agender has its own wiki were users can collaborate to create the documentation for this marvellous software

item.title: Agender 1.1.9 released
item.description: The 1.1.9 release of Agender is available for download right now including a new submenu to change the language, a bug fix in the interprocess communication for windows and the option to install system wide or per user (thanks Jason!)

item.title: Agender 1.1.8.1 bug fix
item.description: The 1.1.8.1 subrelease of Agender is available to fix the bug that caused Agender to crash at start under Windows

item.title: Agender 1.1.8 released
item.description: The 1.18 release of Agender is now available for download, including a new translation to Hebrew and an improved installer

item.title: Agender's website layout improved
item.description: The style sheets of the website have been fixed resulting in a generally better look

item.title: Agender 1.1.7.1 released
item.description: The 1.1.7.1 release of Agender is now available to download
